channel.description: Recent content in KernelLoader on Security Blog

item.title: An Overview of windows kernel loader and its variants
item.description: In this log post i will discuss the history of the use of window kernel loaders (reflectively mapping unsigned driver to kernel memory) and the increased number of signed loaders that is found on open-source repos and the adaption for it by the Threat actors. Windows Kernel architecture: Windows OS is divided into two main components: the user-mode (also known as “ring 3”) and the kernel-mode (also known as “ring 0”) parts.
